input_datatypes.name: openshift42_infra_node_on_vmware
input_datatypes.label: OpenShift Container Platform 4.2 Infrastructure Node on VMware

template_input_params.name: infranode_ip
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node Public IP Address
template_input_params.description: Infrastructure Node Public IP Address. This IP address must have a mapping to the OCP cluster app URL in your DNS or in your local etc hosts file.

template_input_params.name: infranode_hostname
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node Hostname
template_input_params.description: Infrastructure Node Hostname.

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_disk1_datastore
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node Disk 1 datastore name
template_input_params.description: Infrastructure Node Disk 1 datastore name.

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node IPv4 Gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 Gateway Address for network customization on the virtual machine.

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node IPv4 Netmask (CIDR)
template_input_params.description: Integer value between 1 and 32 for the prefix length (CIDR) to use when statically assigning an IPv4 address
template_input_params.regexdesc: Provide an integer value between 1 and 32

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_os_user
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node Template User Name
template_input_params.description: The user name to connect to the Infrastructure Node.

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_os_password
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node Template User Password
template_input_params.description: The user password to connect to the Infrastructure Node.

template_input_params.name: infranode_vm_template
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure Node OS Image Template Name (RHEL 7.4 or above template)
template_input_params.description: Infrastructure Node OS Image Template Name. If it is in a folder then include folder name as follows 'folder_name/image_template_name'

template_input_params.name: proxy_server
template_input_params.description: Proxy server and port in SERVER:PORT format
template_input_params.label: Proxy server and port

template_input_params.name: vm_private_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Private Network adapter type for infrastructure and OCP cluster VM vNIC Configuration
template_input_params.label: Private Network Adapter Type for infrastructure and OCP cluster VM

template_input_params.name: vsphere_network
template_input_params.label: Private Network name for infrastructure and OCP cluster VM
template_input_params.description: Private vSphere Network name for infrastructure and OCP cluster VM.

template_input_params.name: vsphere_datastore
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine datastore name
template_input_params.label: Datastore Name

template_input_params.name: ocp_cluster_domain
template_input_params.label: OCP Base Domain Name
template_input_params.description: OCP Base Domain Name. The combination of cluster name and this domain name creates what a cluster domain, that will be used by OCP cluster nodes and the URLs.

template_input_params.name: ocp_vm_template
template_input_params.label: OCP Cluster VMs Template Name (RHCOS 4.2 image template)
template_input_params.description: Name of the VM template to clone to create VMs for the cluster.

template_input_params.name: pullsecret
template_input_params.label: Base64 encoded OCP image pull secret
template_input_params.description: Base64 encoded OCP image pull secret. You can obtain this from your Red Hat account page.

template_input_params.name: vm_clone_timeout
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Clone Timeout
template_input_params.description: The timeout, in minutes, to wait for the virtual machine clone to complete.

template_input_params.name: vm_dns_servers
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers
template_input_params.description: A list of DNS servers to add on the virtual machine.

template_input_params.name: vm_dns_suffixes
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes
template_input_params.description: A list of DNS search domains to add to the DNS configuration on the virtual machine.

template_input_params.name: vm_domain_name
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine domain name.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Domain Name

template_input_params.name: vm_folder
template_input_params.description: vSphere folder name to create the infrastructure virtual vachine.
template_input_params.label: Infrastructure VM Folder Name

template_input_params.name: vsphere_cluster
template_input_params.label: vSphere cluster Name
template_input_params.description: Name of the vSphere cluster.

template_input_params.name: vsphere_datacenter
template_input_params.description: The name of a datacenter in which to create the virtual machine and other assets.
template_input_params.label: Datacenter Name

template_input_params.name: vsphere_datastore
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine datastore name
template_input_params.label: Datastore Name

template_input_params.name: vsphere_resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Name of the default resource pool for the cluster. Must be specified as 'cluster_name/resource_pool'
template_input_params.label: Resource Pool Name

template_input_params.name: bootstrap_ip
template_input_params.description: Ip Address for Bootstrap node'
template_input_params.label: Bootstrap IP

template_input_params.name: master_ips
template_input_params.label: Master IPs
template_input_params.description: A list of ip addresses for the master nodes.

template_input_params.name: worker_ips
template_input_params.label: Worker IPs
template_input_params.description: A list of ip addresses for the worker nodes.

template_output_params.name: cluster_prvt_key
template_output_params.label: OCP Cluster VM Private Key (base64 encoded)
